code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GitHubUserProfile=_ref=>{let{username}=_ref;const[profile,setProfile]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProfile=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`https://api.github.com/users/${username}`);setProfile(response.data);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching user profile',err);}};fetchProfile();},[username]);if(!profile)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:profile.avatar_url,alt:`${profile.login}'s avatar`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:profile.login}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:profile.bio}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:profile.html_url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"View Profile on GitHub"})]});};export default GitHubUserProfile;
